title: Silver 3 Looking for Duo Partner
body:
Currently S3. Just got demoted from S2. I can play any role decently except ADC. Pretty meh.

Was duoing with someone who wasnt going to get out of S5.

Worked my way form B4 this season.

Had a few bad games recently soloing.

Discord is a must.

IGN - Jongtu

replies.body: I'm S1 and I go mid/top, and yeah, voicechat is boss
